oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Delta Gamma Beta Dance at Belle Meade Country Club, 1957 October 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo of members of Delta Gamma Beta students humanitarian service organization, at a formal dance hosted at Belle Meade Country Club, October 25th, 1957. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
